properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 1:40AM CST until February 16 at 10:17AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Cahaba River At Centreville...
Suttle...and Marion Junction...

.Heavy rainfall over the past 24 to 48 hours has led to rises across
the Cahaba River basin... a flood warning remains in effect
for the Cahaba River at Centreville, Marion Junction, and near Suttle.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Cahaba River At Marion Junction.
* from Thursday morning to Sunday morning...or until the Warning is
cancelled.
* AT  1:00 AM Wednesday the stage was 29.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 36.0 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow late morning  and
continue to rise to near 37.8 feet by Friday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by Saturday night.
* Impact...At 40.0 feet...Extensive overflow of farm lands around
Marion Junction occurs. Some homes and farms begin to be affected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
